verbs.description: just in head of service orders workers to [V: report] [ARGM-LOC: at their duty posts] [ARGM-ADV: in view of the above] i am directed to inform you that all staff are expected to continue to report at their duty posts to carry out their duties pending the hearing and determination of the motion on notice for interlocutory injunction read the circular all permanent secretaries and heads of extra - ministerial departments and agencies are to bring the content of this circular to the attention of their staff and ensure strict compliance head of service orders workers trade union congress mrs didi walson jack head of the civil service permanent secretary winifred oyo - ita nigeria labour congress national industrial court of nigeria hocsf abuja division sahara reporters service welfare office national industrial court trades union congress mrs didi walson - jack winifred oyo ita
